CustomField.description: Field for use is WF to determine if PE Approval is required
CustomField.formula: OR( INCLUDES(Innovation_Type__c, 'DXPlus'), INCLUDES(Innovation_Type__c, 'DX'), AND(INCLUDES(Innovation_Type__c,'DXC'), OpportunityMarketSegment__c = 'Wearable'), isOmega__c)
CustomField.label: Requires PE Approval
